name: Simurg
description: The Simurg is a gargantuan celestial creature with formidable flying capabilities, showcasing strength with its powerful bite and claw attacks.
memorable: Its ability to control the battlefield with Forceful Gale while providing support through potent spellcasting makes it unique.
goals: To serve as a powerful ally in combat and assist those in need through healing and protection.
relations: Might be encountered with other celestials or allies in battle.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or during conflicts on the Material Plane.
strengths: High hit points and strong physical attacks, along with versatile spellcasting for healing and control.
weaknesses: Relatively low armor class for its size, making it vulnerable to focused attacks from ranged enemies.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with a bite and two claw strikes, dealing substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Forceful Gale allows it to create a powerful wind gust, influencing the battlefield by knocking creatures prone.
senses: Possesses keen sight with advantage on perception checks that rely on sight, enhancing threat detection.
skills: High perception skill at +6, making it adept at detecting hidden or approaching foes.
additional_information: Resistant to radiant damage, providing additional durability.
Innate spellcasting allows for versatile support without material components.
Can detect poison and disease, ensuring safety for allies.
Flyby ability prevents opportunity attacks, enhancing its mobility.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting includes healing and restorative spells, such as Cure Wounds and Greater Restoration.
test_queries: flying monster with powerful wind abilities
celestial ally that can heal and fight
elusive creature that controls the battlefield
